wikitext.*:
'''Matthew T. Blessing''' (September [[1962]]) is the former Head of the Department of Special Collections and University Archives at [[Marquette University]]. He was responsible for the Tolkien Collection at the university, which contains the largest and rarest Tolkien items in the world, from 1999 to 2012. Since 2012, he has been the [https://www.wisconsinhistory.org/Records/Article/CS3543 State Archivist and Division Administrator at the Wisconsin Historical Society].
